name: Words within words that start with END Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
The question layout is as described below:

CUR + A clue for the 'word within the word' = A clue for the combined word. 

The answer is the combined word.

END + Ire = To expose to harm.
END + A piece of china from which to eat food = Flattened end of a motor neuron.
END + Shrewd = Standing up on edge.
END + A dot = The point in a titration at which no more titrant should be added.
END + Was in debt = Provided with property.
END + A relatively great distance = Lengthwise.
END + Organ of hearing = To make beloved or sympathetic.
END + A short message = A piece of writing at the bottom of a page which makes reference to the above text.
END + Not as much of something = Without a limit.
END + A pastime = The final stage of a chess match.
